validation.min: Password should have at least eight characters.
validation.passwordWeak: Password should be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

homepage.howWillUse: How will you use HUMAN App?
homepage.iWantToEarn: I want to complete tasks, and earn HMT
homepage.completeTask: Complete multiple task types, and get paid.
homepage.joinAsOperator: I want to join as an operator
homepage.runAsOracle: Run an oracle, or other essential service, and earn fees.

errors.emailTaken: Email is already taken. Please sign in.

signUpForm.title: Sign Up
signUpForm.termsOfServiceAndPrivacyPolicy: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and that you have read our <2>Privacy Policy</2>

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.paragraph1: We've sent an email to <1>{{email}}</1>, please check your inbox and verify your email.
verifyEmail.paragraph2: The verification link is valid for 24 hours.
verifyEmail.paragraph3: <1>Can't find our email?</1> If you can't find the email in your inbox please check the spam folder.
verifyEmail.successResent: Verification email has been successfully resent.
verifyEmail.authError: Log in before you resend email verification

emailVerification.title: Email Verified
emailVerification.description: You are ready to go. Your email has been successfully verified!

sendResetLinkForm.title: Reset Password
sendResetLinkForm.description: Please enter your email address. We will send you an email to reset your password.
sendResetLinkForm.invalidEmailError: Please enter a valid email address.

sendResetLinkSuccess.title: Reset Password
sendResetLinkSuccess.paragraph1: We've sent an email to <1>{{email}}</1> Please check your inbox and verify your email.
sendResetLinkSuccess.paragraph2: The verification link is valid for 24 hours.
sendResetLinkSuccess.paragraph3: <1>Can't find our email?</1> Please check your spam folder, or click below and we will send you a new one.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below.

resetPasswordSuccess.title: Password Changed
resetPasswordSuccess.description: Your password has been changed successfully.

profile.walletAddressMessage: This address is the wallet address where you will receive payments for completing tasks.

topNotifications.completeSteps: Please set up your profile by completing the steps below.

registrationInExchangeOracle.completeMessage: Click on Complete once you have finished the registration process:

jobs.errorFetchingData: There was an error while fetching data, please try again

hcaptchaLabeling.description: HMT payouts are automatically computed by an oracle based on correctness and volume of tasks completed. Payout timing depends on total job size, and can take as little as an hour or as long as a week or so, depending on overall job status.
hcaptchaLabeling.noJobs: No jobs available at the moment. Please come back in:

enableHCaptchaLabeling.description: CAPTCHA tasks involve the correct labeling of images in a group of images. Read the instructional prompt, and select the images that best correspond to that prompt.

hcaptchaLabelingStats.earnedLastHour: HMT earned in the last hour
hcaptchaLabelingStats.statisticsNotLive: Statistics are not live. Please refresh to view live statistics.

editExistingKeysSuccess.title: Setup Operator
editExistingKeysSuccess.paragraph2: Operator setup is completed, please press the button below to finish sign up.

walletConnectModal.paragraph: HUMAN App is a multichain platform, please provide a wallet address which will be compatible with different chains. <1>Learn more or FAQ link.</1>

expirationModal.description: Please log in again to continue using the app.

updateVersionModal.newVersion: We've just released a new version of HUMAN App with enhanced features.
updateVersionModal.please: To continue using the app, please:
updateVersionModal.assistance: These steps help us ensure the safety of your account and provide you with a better experience. Thank you for your understanding! For assistance, reach out on
